title: Note - 2
clause_text: Note - 2. The Municipal Commissioner may relax the side & rear marginal distances as per Regulation No.2.4 of UDCPR subject to following provisions.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
